metadata.name: FreeCell Solitaire
metadata.author: Card Game Engine
metadata.description: Classic FreeCell with strategic gameplay. Use free cells wisely to build foundations.

instructions.overview: Move all cards to the four foundation piles by suit, from Ace to King. Use the four free cells strategically to temporarily store cards.
setup: All 52 cards are dealt face-up into 8 tableau columns
First 4 columns get 7 cards each, last 4 columns get 6 cards each
Four free cells available for temporary card storage
gameplay: Tableau: Build down in alternating colors (red-black-red, etc.)
Only the top card of each column can be moved
Multiple cards can be moved if you have enough free cells/empty columns
Free Cells: Store any single card temporarily
Foundations: Build up by suit from Ace to King (A-2-3-...-K)
Double-click any card to auto-move it to foundations or free cells
Mobile: Pinch to zoom, two-finger drag to pan the board
Desktop: Drag and drop cards between columns, cells, and foundations
instructions.winning: Move all 52 cards to the four foundation piles, completing each suit from Ace to King
